I fucking hate this game.
It can lick my cock and balls and dick and nuts and shaft and testicles.

Solid 5/7.

Well you pay 13 euros to pay again the same sum for an operation that is not even that cool
You pay 13 euros to get prime but what have you got there? Hackers
You get trollers, boosted people in high ranks and people(usually russian or ukranians that zone) who dont know english at all not even saying about the fact that they start speaking their language if they have a fellow comrade(i do this too but here comes the difference) they dont give any info and they voice troll you
If you get to play agianst a hacker yeah u loose he might get banned but you still get a loose maybe still demoted and they(the ones who were in the team with the cheater) still have it as a win if they report him
If you think that you can start from silver 1(let's say) and want to rank without help from higher rankes be sure that you will find smurfers you just make your life hard
And yes if you play with a higher rank and they play ok not boosted but not really deserving the rank be sure that if they loose will be your fault because you are the low rank and its your fault that you are loosing and they will leave 100% if their rank might be in danger(might not happend if you are friends in real life or just know each other very well and playing for fun)
Beside these and even more things i could say that this is a nice game where if you have enough ambition you can rank and if you dont try harding every match might have some fun

Antaño jugué con amigos, hoy, haciendo 3 años desde la última vez que lo jugué, me disponia a reinstalarlo por recordad viejos tiempos, y me ha salido la opción de dejar una reseña, y aqui me veo.
No es el mejor juego al que jugar, es un shooter mas diria yo, pero lo veo una buena opción para jugar con amigos y echar unas risas, sin dejar de ser un juego muy serio.
